page.title: 12BACK LANES _ WALLSEND
page.content: Most of the{housing}in Wallsend is built in terraces with lanes in between which are used for{social}as well as utilitarian purposes.Children spend a great deal of time in the lanes on bikes,playing football, hopscotch,jackpot,swingball,tennis, hide and seek and many other{games. } Dad uses the back lane to park or work on the car and this in turn becomes a prop in many of the children's games. Mum, while hanging out the washing, takes the opportunity for a gossip with the neighbours or gives the baby an airing.Often the back lane is obscured by washing hung across it. At times it becomes almost impassable with so many activities taking place. The lifestyle of the{community}centres on the back lanes.
